name: rozgaar-link
description: Rozgaar is a **job-matching web app** designed for daily wage workers and job providers. It helps connect skilled workers (such as electricians, carpenters, and plumbers) with employers looking for their services. The platform supports real-time job postings, worker applications, and chat functionality.

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix Client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix Client"
